name: Colour Calamity
description:
Protect the pink tiles below you by shooting the falling squares. Orange squares can only be shot with orange bullets and blue squares can only be shot with blue bullets. To switch bullets, move the paddle to the corresponding colour square on the left or right of the screen.

Controls

  • Move left - A or left arrow.
  • Move right - D or right arrow.
  • Shoot - Space bar or left mouse.
  • Exit application - Escape.
